data.title: Continues to be #1 for breakfast!
data.text: If you think you can walk in here and order 2 tacos for breakfast, you'd BEST be hungry - they are HUGE!  I love stopping in here for breakfast - service is generally great, and the homemade tortilla's are outstanding.

data.title: always GREAT
data.text: we eat here quite often, breakfast tacos are AWESOME, plates are great, good value, cannot say enough about this place. glad we found it.

data.title: No Frills with Big Thrills
data.text: very family style restaurant with kind attentive customer service.  this is our first visit here. Not knowing how large the tacos are, we ordered two each and could not finish either one but put a big dent in them.  also very affordable. For $20, we had two beers total, four tacos total, chips with salsa, and one large soda.  that includes the taxes.  very reasonable indeed. I will attach 4 photos total and you can see the filled tacos and large portions.

data.title: BEST breakfast tacos!!!
data.text: This place gives you the biggest breakfast tacos I've ever gotten!  and is usually always packed for breakfast!!  Very economical and tasty!!!

data.title: good tacos
data.text: the tacos are very good, but the tortillas are too thick for my liking...the breakfast plates are very filling and smell really good!!!  go hungry

data.title: Best breakfast in town
data.text: Best place in town or anywhere to get breakfast tacos the wait is long for the drive thru but call ahead. They are well worth the wait.

data.title: Lil taste of heaven.been
data.text: Been there plenty of times..always good..I even got speeding on my way up there on valentines day 2013..Becky Is a awesome watriess.

data.title: Authentic Mexican Food at it's best
data.text: Los Gallos Taco House is located in New Braunfels, Tx off of hwy46 and loop 337. It offers the best authentic mexican food this side of the border. The plates of food are huge with more than reasonable prices. This place is a must if you're traveling through the New Braunfels area. You will not be disappointed at all

data.title: Breakfast Tacos worth waiting for
data.text: This is the place in New Braunfels to get your morning fix of breakfast tacos. They use fresh made daily tortilla's and all ingredients are cooked to order. If you are getting them to go, be ready to wait in line inside at the counter, or on the drive thru. They do have a large dining room and the staff is very friendly and attentive to their customers. If you are going to order to go you can call it in and it will be ready when you get there, very little waiting.

data.title: Best Migas in Town
data.text: We eat at Los Gallos several times monthly. My favorite dish are the migas - they are so cheesy and yummy!  My husband really enjoys the breakfast bowl so he can pick different things to go in it every time we eat here.

data.title: Eating at Los Gallos
data.text: Parking can be a problem here.  You never know when they will be open or closed. Came several times and they were closed.  The restaurant was clean, the appearance inside so so.  They give big portions and the prices are reasonable.  The breakfast food is tasty.

data.title: Gallo Great!
data.text: The food here is really good.  They are known for their breakfast tacos but we've only had their full meals.  They always arrive hot and ample.  The flavors are wonderful!

data.title: Huge Tacos
data.text: Hungry? Drop into to Kono's Los Gallos restaurant and run into the locals enjoying enormous breakfast tacos, migas, and more.

data.title: Never had migas before.  Now I'm hooked.
data.text: Los Gallos is a small cafe.  It doesn't look like much.  The service is really good and the food is great.  The salsa is wonderful but the real attraction for me is a breakfast of migas, which I had never had before a recent trip to New Braunfels to see my daughter.  She is hooked on migas so we went there.  All it took was once and I was hooked too.  Migas is a scrambled egg dish with onions and cheese and corn tortilla chips and is smothered in ranchero sauce.  The ranchero sauce is not peppery hot but it is very flavorful.  The eggs are served with refried beans which are also delicious. Also it was extremely easy on the pocketbook.  My son-in-law had enchiladas and said they were very good also. I was only in town for a week and we went there 3 times!

data.title: Breakfast Tacos to Die For
data.text: I have lived in New Braunfels for 20 odd years.  And, I have traveled all over the Southwest and Mexico.  Los Gallos,, beyond a shadow of a doubt, has the best Tex-Mex breakfast I have ever eaten.  I feel quite fortunate to live in the same town they are located.  They started out in a little shack and now have a true little restaurant with a drive thru and boy are they busy.  There is usually a table inside to sit at but the drive thru almost has cars in it.  Breakfast (especially since they open at 6AM) and lunch. Their Huevos Rancheros has no equal and their pancakes (yes I said pancakes) are really out of this world.  And you can have your breakfast taco built the way you want.  You can either use the ala carte line or sit at a table and be waited on.  Either way you manipulate the menu as your taste requires.  If you are ever in New Braunfels make it a point to stop.  You WILL NOT be disappointed.

data.title: Love their huge breakfast tacos
data.text: Their breakfast tacos are the best around, they are big enough to fill even the hungriest guys...personally love the carne guisada the best.

data.title: Do not sell yourself short!!!
data.text:
I will be frank and to the point....
This place is the bomb. Large plates, more than reasonable prices and authentic Mexican food that simply the best. Simply the best breakfast spot on New Braunfels, Tx. It's my go to restaurant every time I am in town.

data.title: Best breakfast tacos
data.text: Love their breakfast tacos - although you definitely want to call ahead at peak times & have them ready at the drive thru since it stays busy.  Good Huevos Rancheros & enchiladas too.  Great size portions.  Looks like a hole in the wall but well worth a visit.

data.title: Great mexican food
data.text: The staff is very friendly but a little overworked. The restaurant is very popular with the locals. The salsa is good and the food is about the best mexican to be had in New Braunfels.

data.title: NOT CLOSED!
data.text: This place is open and doing great. LOVE their breakfast tacos. They are HUGE and very flavorful!  Love their salsa!
